_README: This is the trading config that attaches to a frontend profile. Add this as 'tradingConfig' when creating/editing a profile in the Profile Manager. These values flow to the backend when the trader is activated.

screenshot_regions._note: mss capture regions in NATIVE screen pixels (3840x2140). Each timeframe gets its own region targeting the corresponding chart panel in the APEX three-panel layout.

15m._description: TACTICAL panel — top chart in APEX algo view

1h._description: TREND panel — middle chart in APEX algo view
